articles.content:
Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones has come to accept that his team will likely start the year without star running back Ezekiel Elliott.

articles.title: Apple's 11-inch iPad Pro is on sale on Amazon right now — you can save $50 to $399 depending on the model

articles.title: A website that revealed personal information about porn actors has been shut down by a porn company: 'We simply didn't want it out there for the world to see anymore'

articles.title: Armed with J-20 stealth fighters, China's future flattops could 'eventually fight US carriers'

articles.title: How to delete your Fitbit account and erase your personal data
